

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = GenConBlf, y =VacIntMMR))+
  geom_point(aes(color = Condition), alpha = .7, position = "jitter")+
  #geom_smooth(aes(color = Condition), method = "lm", se = FALSE)+
  labs(x = "MMR vaccination intention",
       y = "Level of general conspiracy belief")+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = c("Definitely won't", "Probably won't", "Middle of the road", "Probably will", "Definitely will"), 
                     breaks = 1:5, limits = c(1,5))+
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 25, hjust = 1))+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = c("None", " ", "Moderate", " ", "A lot"),
                     breaks = 1:5, limits = c(1,5))+
  transition_states(data$Condition,
                    transition_length = 1,
                    state_length = 1)+
  ggtitle("Do parents with Conspiracy beliefs intend to vaccinate their children against Measles?",
          subtitle = "Intention after reading {Condition} message format")+
  theme_minimal()


animate(plot1.animate, renderer = magick_renderer())
```


```{r}
data %>% filter(Gender == c("Female", "Male")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(GenConBlf)) +
  geom_density(aes(fill = Gender), color = "white", alpha = .3)+
  labs(title = "Males vs Females: Who has higher general conspiracy belief?",
       x = "Level of general conspiracy belief",
       y = "Density")+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
